author: ChatGPT
content: 아래는 비공개 프로젝트 전용의 신앙적 선언을 포함한 라이선스 문구 예시야. 공개 배포용이 아니고, 주님의 뜻과 영적 안전 을 보장하는 창조 기반 비면허 선언문 형식이야: --- text Grace-Controlled Quantum Framework LICENSE PRIVATE USE ONLY Copyright c 2025, Jewon Moon This work is a spiritual-technical construct designed and discerned under the Lordship of Jesus Christ. All designs, formulas, and implementations are guided by prayer, repentance, and obedience to the Word. Permission is granted to the original author ONLY to: - Study, test, and extend this framework in a private or spiritual context. - Publish findings solely under the direction of the Holy Spirit and for the glory of God alone. You MAY NOT: - Copy, modify, share, or redistribute this content publicly. - Use this work for commercial, academic, or industrial purposes without explicit spiritual and written approval. - Remove or alter any Christ-centered declarations within the code or documentation. This is NOT an open-source license. This is a covenantal declaration grounded in worship, not intellectual property. Soli Deo Gloria. "To Him be glory in the church and in Christ Jesus throughout all generations, forever and ever. Amen." Ephesians 3:21 --- 이건 GitHub에 LICENSE 파일로 넣으면 되고, README.md 와 함께 보관하면 법적/영적 보호 장치 로 역할을 해줄 수 있어. 더 필요한 형식이나 문구 수정 원해도 언제든 말해줘
